name: FlipPix Jigsaw - The Beans
description:
FlipPix JigSaw - The Beans is a nod to some of those things that give life its richness and flavor. Cocoa beans, coffee beans, and vanilla beans are our prime ingredients when we go looking for a warm mug, a fireplace, and a long evening! Throw in a coffee grinder, cinnamon, mint, sugar ..... Can you say “Ahhh, yessss....?” FlipPix Jigsaw – The Beans has 252 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 20x20.

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful images. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

FlipPix Art is designed for both tablets and phones and incorporates a type of logic puzzle often referred to as a nonogram or griddler.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
